Description: Body sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery phiale mesomphalos; white slip; interior: glazed streaky black (worn in places); from top, added red band; added white band; band of tongues in white outline with red centres; exterior: band between lines; single line preserved at bottom of sherd.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1959) (phase 2)
